versos: (quickly) Revelation 22:7 - "Behold, I am coming quickly Blessed is he who keeps the words of the prophecy of this book.";;;
(measures) "He also measured the wall around the house, six cubits wide and twelve cubits high." - 1 Kings 6:5;;;
(fine) 1 Samuel 17:18 - "Bring also these ten cheese to the commander of their thousand. See how your brothers are, and bring some token from them.";;;
(cakes) "Moreover ye shall take no satisfaction for the life of a murderer, which is guilty of death: but he shall be surely put to death." - Numbers 35:31;;;
(hearth) Proverbs 17:3 - "The fining pot is for silver, and the furnace for gold: but the Lord trieth the hearts.";;;
(herd) Nehemiah 12:44 - On that day men were appointed over the storerooms

(calf) Exodus 32:4 - "And he received the gold from their hand and fashioned it with a graving tool and made a golden calf. And they said, These are your gods, O Israel, who brought you up out of the land of Egypt";;;
(hasted) Genesis 19:22 - "Haste thee, escape thither; for I cannot do any thing till thou be come thither. Therefore the name of the city was called Zoar.";;;
(butter) Proverbs 30:33 - For as churning cream produces butter
(dressed) Genesis 41:42 - "Then Pharaoh took his signet ring from his finger and put it on Josephs finger. He dressed him in robes of fine linen and put a gold chain around his neck.";;;
(stricken) Isaiah 53:4 - "Surely he has borne our griefs and carried our sorrows; yet we esteemed him stricken, smitten by God, and afflicted.";;;
(ceased) Genesis 8:5 - And the waters decreased continually until the tenth month: in the tenth month
(waxed) And the men of Judah gave a shout: and as the men of Judah shouted
(hide) Psalm 32:7 - "You are my hiding place; you will protect me from trouble and surround me with songs of deliverance.";;;
(korah) Numbers 16:1 - "Now korah, the son of Izhar, the son of Kohath, the son of Levi, and Dathan and Abiram, the sons of Eliab, and On, the son of Peleth, sons of Reuben, took men:";;;
(justice) Isaiah 1:17 - Learn to do right; seek justice. Defend the oppressed. Take up the cause of the fatherless; plead the case of the widow.;
